1382050.name: Fantasy Grounds - Savage Worlds Over-Sized Action Deck
1382050.description:
Savage Worlds Over-Sized Action Deck

Act Now with Savage Worlds Action Cards!
The all-new over-sized
Savage Worlds Action Deck (used for initiative in the game) is a throwback to our favorite deck ever, with art by the original artist, Cheyenne Wright! Each suit features iconic characters from four core genres: fantasy, pulp, diamonds, and horror. On the back of each card is a reminder of the suit order as well (Spades, Hearts, Diamonds, Clubs) for resolving ties.
For use with Savage Worlds Adventure Edition (SWADE). It can also be used in Pathfinder for Savage Worlds and Savage Worlds Deluxe. You may also be interested in the Savage Worlds Status Cards or Savage Worlds Power Cards.
Note to previous purchasers: This is no longer a theme. It's now an extension named "Feature: SW - Oversized Action Deck (SWADE)" and a module named "SWADE Oversized Action Deck".
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Michael Serfass
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the Savage Worlds Adventure Edition ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
